## ControlBarProps type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ControlBarProps = React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement> & {
  variation?: 'minimal' | 'verbose' | 'textOnly';
  controls?: ControlBarControls;
};
```
